name: Acidic Hail
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Acidic hailstones fall from the sky, striking a 20 foot radius cylinder 100 feet tall. Creatures in the area when it is created and who start their turn in the area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 4d4 cold and 4d4 acid damage, halved on a success. The hailstones break apart on impact and transform the terrain into difficult terrain.

During your turn, you can spend 1 AP to move the hail up to 30 feet.
empower: Damage increased to 6d4 cold damage and 6d4 acid damage.
